page.title: 10LIFE STYLES
page.content: THERE ARE TWO PUBLIC HOUSES IN OUR AREA, (APART FROM THE NAAFI CLUB ON THE RAF STATION), THE FOUR HORSESHOES JUST OUTSIDE THE VILLAGE OF LONG SUTTON, AND THE POACHERS, IN THE VILLAGE OF SOUTH WARNBOROUGH. BOTH PUBS ARE USUALLY QUITE BUSY AND ATTRACT PEOPLE FROM OUTSIDE THE VILLAGES AS WELL AS HAVING A STEADY TRADE FROM LOCAL PEOPLE. THE POACHERS IN PARTICULAR IS BUSY BECAUSE IT IS ACTUALLY IN THE VILLAGE AND SERVES HOT MEALS AND EXCELLENT SALADS AT LUNCH TIMES AND IN THE EVENINGS. THERE ARE MANY LOCAL PEOPLE WHO GO INTO THESE PUBS TO MEET FRIENDS AND PLAY THE USUAL PUB GAMES SUCH AS DARTS. BECAUSE THERE ARE NO OTHER FACILITIES THESE PUBS ARE IMPORTANT AS THEY PROVIDE THE AREA WITH FOCAL POINTS.
